name: Happy Diwali - Firecrackers Simulator
description:
Now celebrate Diwali in your computer!

Instructions:

Extract the ZIP file contents to a folder and run Happy_Diwali.exe.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • WASD and Mouse
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 number keys for firecrackers
  • Escape to quit the game

--------------------------------------------------------------

Made in one day using Unity3D

-by Gurpreet Singh Matharoo
